basics.name: Marc Picaud
basics.label: Full-Stack Web Developer
basics.summary: 90s kid working towards becoming an A-player software engineer

work.summary: FabLife provides an innovative nutrition program to men who struggle with fertility issues, based on cutting-edge scientific research and the power of modern web technologies
highlights: Tech Lead (software & technical operations)

work.summary: FabLife provides an innovative nutrition program to men who struggle with fertility issues, based on cutting-edge scientific research and the power of modern web technologies
highlights: Contributed to build the MVP
Maintained an expert system in the nutrition field
Designed and engineered back-office applications
Designed and engineered a PDF server that can generate complex documents programmatically
Implemented automated functional tests
Contributed on recruitment, onboarding and mentoring of new engineers
Lead outsourced projects (technical specs, communication, dev tools etc.)
Engineered a POC mobile app
Built a few chatbots
Maintained a WordPress website
Integrated third party APIs (Stripe, Twilio, Mandrill, Slack, Gitlab, Redmine, Jenkins)

work.summary: PrestaShop is an efficient and innovative e-commerce solution with all the features you need to create an online store and grow your business.
highlights: Delivered new PrestaShop extensions (payment solutions, marketing solutions, data viz and automation tools)
Helped to improve internal tools such as CRM interfaces or team workflows
Provided great customer care and support for clients all over the world
Created new revenue streams by designing innovative products
Maintained legacy code
Migrated best-seller products towards a new Symfony2 architecture
Onboarded new developers

work.summary: Providing technology solutions for the lodging industry and businesses
highlights: Learned SaaS methodologies
Discovered the North American culture
Contributed on the development of a digital display solution

education.institution: Ecole Nationale de Chimie, Physique, Biologie

publications.name: What it takes to have your health on point
publications.summary: What I learned from my journey of building sane habits (and quitting toxic ones)

references.name: Cecile Dubouis, Chief Experience Officer @ PrestaShop
references.reference: Quel plaisir d'avoir Marc dans notre équipe ! Tout en suivant son alternance, il a rejoint l'équipe développeurs Addons chez PrestaShop. Marc est volontaire pour apprendre, pour découvrir de nouveaux projets, il est également source de proposition et est très impliqué, le tout dans un excellent esprit. Je recommande Marc !
